name: Long Yumemiru Table
description: A traditional long table made from Yumemiru Wood. Its surface has been dyed using special methods from Inazuma, and it has lovely, bright metals as ornamentation.\nThey say that this kind of table is a good match for the kitchenware and teaware usually used by Inazumans, and can help to maintain the temperature of dishes and tea, which makes for a better dining experience.
